Brett.name: Brett
Brett.title: INSTRUCTOR
Brett.openingMessage: Get ready for some HTML questions good sir!
Brett.losingMessage: Sorry good sir, come back after some prep!
Brett.winningMessage: Good sir, Cody is going to love you!

questions.question: What does HTML Stand for?
Who is making the Web standards?
Choose the correct HTML element for the largest heading:
What is the correct HTML element for inserting a line break?
What is the correct HTML for adding a background color?
Choose the correct HTML element to define important text
Choose the correct HTML element to define emphasized text
What is the correct HTML for creating a hyperlink?
Which character is used to indicate an end tag?
How can you open a link in a new tab/browser window?
How can you make a numbered list?
How can you make a bulleted list?
What is the correct HTML for making a checkbox?
What is the correct HTML for making a text input field?
What is the correct HTML for making a drop-down list?
What is the correct HTML for making a text area?
What is the correct HTML for inserting an image?
What is the correct HTML for inserting a background image?
An <iframe> is used to display a web page within a web page.
answers: There is no such thing as an <iframe>

questions.question: HTML comments start with <!-- and end with -->
Block elements are normally displayed without starting a new line.
Which HTML element defines the title of a document?
Which HTML attribute specifies an alternate text for an image, if the image cannot be displayed?
Which doctype is correct for HTML5?
Which HTML element is used to specify a footer for a document or section?
In HTML, you can embed SVG elements directly into an HTML page.
What is the correct HTML element for playing video files?
What is the correct HTML element for playing audio files?
The HTML global attribute, "contenteditable" is used to:
answers: Specify whether the content of an element should be editable or not
Specifies a context menu for an element. The menu appears when a user right-clicks on the element
Return the position of the first found occurrence of content inside a string

questions.question: In HTML, onblur and onfocus are:
Graphics defined by SVG is in which format?
The HTML <canvas> element is used to:
In HTML, which attribute is used to specify that an input field must be filled out?
Which input type defines a slider control?
Which HTML element is used to display a scalar measurement within a range?
Which HTML element defines navigation links?
In HTML, what does the <aside> element define?
answers: A navigation list to be shown at the left side of the page
Content aside from the page content
The ASCII character-set; to send information between computers on the Internet

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to specify a header for a document or section?
